import{getUser,isAuthenticated,getExtraData}from'@onaio/session-reducer';import{connect}from'react-redux';import Sidebar from'../../components/page/Sidebar';/** Connect the component to the store */ /** map state to props */var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){var result={authenticated:isAuthenticated(state),user:getUser(state),extraData:getExtraData(state)};return result;};var mapDispatchToProps={};/** create connected component */ /** Connected Sidebar component
 */var ConnectedSidebar=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Sidebar);export default ConnectedSidebar;
